com.shinobicontrols.chart.axis
Class AxisInteractions

java.lang.Object
  com.shinobicontrols.chart.axis.AxisInteractions
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoundedTouch2Event.Handler, BoundedTouchEvent.Handler, Event.Handler, SingleTouchEvents.DoubleTouchStartHandler, SingleTouchEvents.MoveEndHandler, SingleTouchEvents.MoveFlingHandler, SingleTouchEvents.MoveHandler, SingleTouchEvents.TouchStartHandler, Touch2Events.Move2EndHandler, Touch2Events.Move2FlingHandler, Touch2Events.Move2Handler, TouchEvent.Handler
public class AxisInteractions
extends Object
implements SingleTouchEvents.TouchStartHandler, SingleTouchEvents.DoubleTouchStartHandler, SingleTouchEvents.MoveHandler, SingleTouchEvents.MoveEndHandler, SingleTouchEvents.MoveFlingHandler, Touch2Events.Move2Handler, Touch2Events.Move2FlingHandler, Touch2Events.Move2EndHandler

Handles all the Touch Events for an Axis. Using methods like setMoveEnabled(boolean), setScaleEnabled(boolean) and setMoveFlingEnabled(boolean) you can control the behaviour of interactions with your Chart.

Constructor Summary

Constructor Detail

AxisInteractions

public AxisInteractions(DefaultRange limit,
                        com.shinobicontrols.chart.axis.AxisMetrics axisMetrics)
Construct an AxisInteractions with a DefaultRange specifying its limits and some Axis specific info. This is called internally and should not be explicitly constructed.

Parameters:
limit - A DefaultRange denoting the limits of the Axis
axisMetrics - Some useful information for the Axis

Whether a hard and fast limit should be applied which should not be gone past.

Whether the Chart can be moved

Returns:
Whether the Chart continues moving with momentum after it has been moved

Whether the Chart continues scaling with momentum after it has been scaled
